channel.title: How to add a control pannel?
channel.description:
I was wondering how I could add a control panel for my server so I would be able to make people mod, admin and owner, update the server, send broadcast messages and see who's online?
Thanks.

item.title: How to add a control pannel?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:469795”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=587098.msg4166666#msg4166666 date=1353793178]
You could either do it in-game (not recommended at ALL) or create a new program to accomplish all of that.
[/quote]
Why don’t you recommend in-game?[/quote]

Unless you have dynamic interfaces sent by the server, putting the console in the client would require having to hardcode it. And due to the amount of bugs already in most client/servers I doubt there would be any input validation initially, and anyone can start banning people.

If you have it server side, only people with access to the server files will be able to use it, and modifying it’s behavior doesn’t require recompiling and redistributing the client.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a control pannel?

item.title: How to add a control pannel?
item.dc:creator: @xxd3v0xx xxd3v0xx
item.description:
@xxd3v0xx wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:6, topic:469795”][quote author=xxd3v0xx link=topic=587098.msg4166671#msg4166671 date=1353793469]
See, when I try doing update for example.

I bring up the developers console thing, next to “1” and type update and nothing happens.

The server is 718 and has around 10 people playing on and we’re testing something for Beta and I would like it all fixed.
[/quote]
That command either isn’t handled or it requires more parameters.[/quote]

I don’t understand what you mean by that, how would I get it to work?

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a control pannel?
